cont.entity_a: Affordable at under $20 compared to Microsoft's higher-priced option.
Reduces wrist discomfort for long computer use. Fits hand perfectly, allowing natural rest.

Not ideal for small hands. Positioning helps a lot with wrist pain, especially for medium-large hands. Ergonomic design helps alleviate wrist pain. Helps reduce hand and wrist strain. Effective in alleviating carpal tunnel symptoms.
Large size is beneficial for comfort and reducing wrist strain. Not suitable for small hands. Large dongle is inconvenient for portability.
Mixed experiences with durability; some units last years, others fail quickly.
cont.entity_b: Tough materials. Cord is twist-resistant and durable.

cont.entity_a: No on/off button or rechargeable batteries. Good battery life. Works well with rechargeable batteries. Long-lasting battery life. High battery consumption.
Very accurate for Photoshop. Precise and responsive for gaming.
cont.entity_b: Laser tracks well with adjustable dpi settings. Precision is very good with switchable settings.

cont.entity_a: Solid construction with loud clicking sound. Difficult middle mouse button to click. Noisy typing but alleviates wrist pain.
cont.entity_b: Scroll wheel can be choppy. Scroll wheel issues after extensive use.

cont.entity_a: Tall design helps maintain comfortable wrist position. Design takes time to get used to, but helps with wrist pain.
cont.entity_b: Interchangeable weights allow customization. Weighting system allows for fine-tuning.

cont.entity_a: Easy and quick software installation. Compatible with Mac without additional software.
Customer service is responsive to defects. Customer service is helpful with replacements.
Short wireless range and high battery consumption. Wireless range is limited and requires line of sight.
Top center buttons for magnification and page back. Difficult to use side buttons for medium-sized hands.
cont.entity_b: Offers 10 buttons for versatile gaming use. Programmable buttons are easy to use and well-placed.

cont.entity_a: Large dongle is inconvenient for portability. Receiver size is inconvenient for transport.

cont.entity_b: Reliable for gaming with adjustable weights. Suitable for gaming with wired connection.

cont.entity_a: Heavy with two batteries, suggesting use of one for lighter weight.
cont.entity_b: Heavy with weight discs, but does not glow in the dark.
